question: You have recently missed a project deadline which resulted in your company losing an important client. Write a letter to your manager. In your letter• apologise for what happened• explain why you missed the deadline• tell him/her how you will avoid this situation in future.
text: I am writing this letter to convey my apologies as I failed to meet the given deadline and as a result of it, we lost a business of an important client.

I can truly understand your situation, however, I want to share with you, why I failed to meet the deadline. Unfortunately, my maternal grandmother passed away due to a heart stroke, which we never expected, as she was strong with no health issues so far. Besides, this my mother was hospitalized due to the sudden death of her mother as she could not take it. During this tough, time I had to take care of her at the hospital since I do not have a father or siblings. Because of all these, I couldn't complete the project before the deadline.

As you're aware of my potential, I would like you to request to give me a chance to prove myself as I will ensure that such incidents will not be repeated as I have already started creating my backup. Therefore, my backup will look after me in my absence even if I am not available due to unavoidable situations in the future.
